wikipedia_page.main: Peter Stanley Lyons (6 December 1927 – 28 November 2006) was an eminent English chorister, choral conductor, cricketer and for 29 years headmaster of Witham Hall School.

response: * Peter Lyons (Virginia judge) (c. 1734–1809), judge of the Virginia Court of Appeals
* Peter Lyons (Queensland judge) (born 1946), justice of the Supreme Court of Queensland
* Headmaster of Wells Cathedral Junior School from 1955 to 1964, where Peter Lyons, the husband of his daughter, Bridget, was Director of Music from 1954 to 1960.
